sys_confirm.*, one_sys_user.id one_sys_user_id, one_sys_user.nick_name one_nick_name, sec_sys_user.id sec_sys_user_id, sec_sys_user.nick_name sec_nick_name, sec_sys_user.login_name sec_login_name
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sys_confirm left join sys_user one_sys_user on one_sys_user.id = sys_confirm.one_partner_id left join sys_user sec_sys_user on sec_sys_user.id = sys_confirm.sec_partner_id
order by ${orderByClause}
